text: The concepts of `.map()`, for loops, and while loops are all examples of what?
The methods `.slice()`, `.pop()`, `.shift()` are all examples of what?
Using a for loop, `.indexOf()`, and `.includes()` are all examples of what?
keydown, mouseover, and click are all examples of what?
arrow, anonymous, callback are all examples of what?
The concepts of `.push()`, `.unshift()`, and `.concat()` are all examples of what?
